thread.title: Keeper Security Unveils Keeper Enterprise 2.0 and Its Channel Partner Program
thread.title_full: Keeper Security Unveils Keeper Enterprise 2.0 and Its Channel Partner Program

author: admin
title: Keeper Security Unveils Keeper Enterprise 2.0 and Its Channel Partner Program
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/29/2015 @ 2:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Keeper Security 
CHICAGO, IL--(Marketwired - September 29, 2015) - Keeper Security, Inc. , creator of Keeper, the world's most downloaded password manager and digital vault, announced today the launch of Keeper Enterprise 2.0, a world-class data protection solution that secures an organization's sensitive data and files across all of its smartphones, tablets and computers. Keeper Enterprise 2.0 adds enhanced functionality around file sharing, user provisioning, auditing, reporting and delegated administration to serve the needs of Global 2000 organizations. During the past year, Keeper Security has implemented a world-class security solution to thwart data breaches. Over 3,000 businesses now use Keeper Enterprise to protect and safeguard their most confidential and sensitive information. 
The launch of Keeper Enterprise 2.0 is being fueled by Keeper's new Channel Partner program, which is designed for value added resellers and mobile operators who will offer Keeper Enterprise into their mobile and security lines. The Channel Partner program is being led by industry veterans, Jim Walsh, Jason Turner and Lance Mead who collectively, have over 50 years of experience in security and EMM. Keeper's channel-driven sales model and deal registration program provides its partners with pre-sales resources, sales training, sales engineering, sales enablement, marketing support, technical support and financial incentives. 
"We spent the past 18 months listening to Fortune 1000 companies -- their pain points, security concerns and work-flow efficiency issues as we built and refined Keeper Enterprise. It's designed with full end-to-end encryption and is a product that IT admins and employees love to use -- it's fast, easy to implement and hyper-secure," said Darren Guccione, CEO at Keeper Security. "We look forward to working with our select group of channel partners to help their customers prevent data breaches and be more productive -- whether it be on entity-provisioned devices or BYOD devices." 
Keeper Enterprise is a software platform that provides both password management and secure digital file storage. The platform ensures that employees utilize Keeper to protect the enterprise's most sensitive assets. Keeper Enterprise is a zero-knowledge platform that utilizes the industry's strongest security protocols including 256-bit AES encryption, two-factor authentication and PBKDF2 key generation while also having the industry's strongest certifications -- SOC 2, TRUSTe, Qualys and HIPAA. 
"Two-thirds of all data breaches today are due to weak passwords, and that's a problem that isn't going away anytime soon," said Matt Rush, Director of Sales at 3Eye Technologies. "By partnering with Keeper Security, our resellers can now offer their customers an easy-to-manage, easy-to-deploy password management solution that takes away the headache of managing multiple passwords. Keeper also offers the most secure digital vault with military grade encryption that gives enterprises peace of mind when it comes to protecting sensitive corporate data. We believe that Keeper is what our customers and partners have needed for a very long time so we're thrilled to be able to offer it to them now." 
Keeper Security, Inc. will be exhibiting at the Gartner Symposium/ITXpo 2015 in Orlando, Florida October 4-8, 2015, demonstrating Keeper Enterprise at booth #1044. To join Keeper's Channel Program please visit: http://keepersecurity.com/channel-partners . 
About Keeper Security 
Keeper Security, Inc. is the creator of Keeper, the world's most downloaded password manager and digital vault. Founded in 2009 by Darren Guccione (CEO) and Craig Lurey (CTO), Keeper Security is privately-held and is based in Chicago, Illinois with engineering offices in El Dorado Hills, California. Keeper is SOC certified and utilizes world-class encryption to safeguard its users. Keeper is available on all major Smartphones, Tablets and Computers -- covering iPhone, iPad, Android, Mac, PC, BlackBerry, Kindle and Windows Phone. 
For more information please visit https://keepersecurity.com .
